release.action: New collector events: COLLECTOR_CLEANED, COLLECTOR_CLEANING COLLECTOR_ENDED, COLLECTOR_STARTED, COLLECTOR_STOPPING, COLLECTOR_STOPPED, COLLECTOR_STORE_EXPORTED, COLLECTOR_STORE_EXPORTING, COLLECTOR_STORE_IMPORTED, COLLECTOR_STORE_IMPORTING
New crawler events: CRAWLER_CLEANING, CRAWLER_CLEANED, CRAWLER_INITIALIZING, CRAWLER_INITIALIZED.
New methods on CrawlerEvent: isCrawlerStartup and isCrawlerShutdown.
New UNSUPPORTED crawl state.
New Collector#clean() method and related events.
New Collector#exportDataStore(), Collector#importDataStore() methods and related events.
New .core.reference package along with new .core.store package for storing of URL crawling information.
New IDataStoreEngine accessible from crawler to store any kind of objects by implementors in their own extensions.
NitriteDataStore now default crawl store implementation.
Now always resume previous incomplete executions. Can now "clean" to start fresh.
Now using XML class from Norconex Commons Lang for loading/saving configuration.
Now using SLF4J for logging.
Lists are now replacing arrays in most places.
ICollector, ICollectorConfig, ICrawler, ICrawlerConfig were all replaced with Collector, CollectorConfig, Crawler, and CrawlerConfig.
Default working directory structure has been modified.
Path is used in addition/instead of File in many places.

Configurable CollectorLifeCycleListener, IJobLifeCycleListener, IJobErrorListener, ISuiteLifeCycleListener, ICrawlerEventListener all replaced with IEventListener. These new listeners can be set on the collector configuration, or be implemented on configuration objects and automatically be detected.
Dependency updates: Norconex Importer 3.0.0, Norconex JEF 5.0.0, Norconex Commons Lang 2.0.0, Norconex Committer 3.0.0, H2 1.4.197.
CrawlerConfig#OrphanStrategy is now public.
Now requires Java 8 or higher.
Command-line arguments are now different, with more options such as "cleaning" previous executions, importing/exporting the crawl store and forcing a commit of any remains from committer queue.
Now use simple file-locks to prevent running conflicting commands concurrently.
Removed "data" package in favor of "reference" package.
Removed some of the deprecated code from 1.x.
Removed CRAWLER_RESUMED crawler event.

Removed CollectorConfigLoader, CollectorLifeCycleListener, CrawlerLifeCycleListener, IJobLifeCycleListener, IJobErrorListener, ISuiteLifeCycleListener, ICrawlerEventListener (replaced by IEventListener).
Remove all previously available crawl store implementions in favor of new NitriteDataStore.
